remarks: Separate out the last term in a finite sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)
statement:
fsumm1.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
fsumm1.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fsumm1.3 $e |- ( k = N -> A = B ) $.
fzosump1 $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. ( M ..^ ( N + 1 ) ) A = ( sum_ k e. ( M ..^ N ) A + B ) ) $.
$d B k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
